metadata.name: Bloom Network Gitcoin Alpha
metadata.description:
üåç Bloom is a cyber-physical social network that helps people find and participate in grassroots climate actions where they live. https://bloomnetwork.earth

Today, we are 30,000 people on the ground in 22 local Bloom hubs across 9 countries doing rapid climate repair and adaptation.

Local Bloom hubs connect existing projects in their region. They plant community gardens, teach people to form agroforestry co-ops, and build regional token economies focused on land and water stewardship. Online, we share knowledge P2P as a global community to implement climate repair more quickly and cost-effectively.

metadata.name: Bloom Network 2023 Impact
metadata.description: 2400 more students trained in Permaculture in Uganda, 110 natural infrastructure in dryland streams for watershed restoration in Texas, phytoremediation of lead in urban land plots + mycological community in Baltimore, 60+ users of our new social network, completed smart contracts for Regenerative Action Rewards protocol, social network live in production!

metadata.name: Bloom Network
metadata.description: Bloom Network is a cyber-physical social network that connects people to grassroots climate actions in their local communities, and rewards them for their impact.
